message: Fix a crash bug when root dir object is corrupted for a repo.
[client] Fix bug in server property setting.
[client] Fix a potential crash bug in download/upload.
[client] Fix a crash bug caused by loading certs.
[client] Fix file locking bug for Office files.
fixed using central_config_dir in seaf-fuse
fixed seaf-server args in seafile controller
fixed seaf-server-init
[server] Fix a bug in diff.

[server] Fix missing history bug for single file.

How to reproduce:
From the client, create a folder with a file in it in one commit.
The first version of the file will be missing.
fixed a typo in refresh_locked_path_status

[server] Bug-fix and improvement to fsck.

- Fix --enable-sync command corrupt encrypted repo issue.
- Require to use the same user as running seafile server to run fsck.
- Only apply --enable-sync command to repaired repos.
Fix bugs discovered by Coverity.
[client] Fix ignore bug.
fixed creating sub repo of encrypted repos
[client] Fix upload missing file bug and add sanity check for commit.
[client] fixed a bug in refresh_locked_path_status
[server] Fix a minor crash bug.

Fix bug in seaf_db_statement_exists().

Should set db_err to TRUE when any error occurs.

Fix a few bugs related to deleting repos on server.

Server:
- Delete entries from Branch and RepoHead tables;
- Restore entries to Branch and RepoHead tables from repo trash.
- When client checks head commit, return DELTED if no entry in
  Repo table.
- When client checks upload/download permission, return DELETED
  if repo doesn't exist.

Client:
- Handle repo DELETED situation in upload/download thread.
[client] Fix a crash bug when objects are corrupted.

[client] Fix bugs of file status.

- Only change worktree sync state to "sync" when it's really syncing.
- Update checked out file timestamp even on conflict.
[server] Work around glib bug of g_object_set().
[win] Fix bugs in extracting system CA.
[client] Fix overlay icon bug when folder becomes empty.

Fix bugs for sync status icon.

- Handle checkout file error.
- Set status to "synced" after checkout a locked file.
- Refresh after sync status is changed.

fixed a bug of reading seafdav.conf

Ref #1092

[client] Fix conflict handling bug in clone.

A conflict file cannot be produced.
fixed delete_repo_tokens_by_peer_id after rebasing
[server] Fix a potential bug in repo trash.

Fix bugs for windows server.

* Close block before committing.
* Refactor http-server module to expose less internal data structures.
* Don't include <evhpt.h> in http-server.h.
* Don't link with libevent-openssl, which is unstable.
[win] Fix long path bug when a folder becomes empty.
[server] Fix SharedRepo bug.
[Mac] Fix bug in wt-monitor and commit.
[client] Fix bug in previous commit.
[client] Fix a bug when adding file to empty dir.

[client] Fix bugs in index code.

Test case:
Have file "test.txt", folder with files "test" and empty folder "test2".
Move folder "test" into folder "test2".
Result: On the server, the folder "test" is not removed.

[client] Fix a bug in creating commits.

Test case:
Add a file larger than 100MB, after uploading the file,
the repo will continuouly get into committing state without anything to commit.

Fix bugs in http sync.

* Server returns 444 instead of 404 when repo is deleted.
* Client handles empty response for check protocol version.

Fix some memory bugs.

* Initialize index structure when index file doesn't exist.
* Use g_hash_table_replace instead of _insert when key and value are the same.
[client] Fix some memory bugs in http sync.
[client] Fix delete folder bug.
[client] Fix case rename bug and remove ignored hidden files when delete empty dir.
Fix bugs in http sync protocol.
[client] Fix some bugs in readonly repo support.
Fix a bug in wt-monitor-macos.c

[server] Fix a bug in displaying deleted files in trash.

How to reproduce:
1. Find a repo that's updated a few days ago
2. Set the history limit to 1 day
3. Delete one file in the repo
4. Enter trash, the deleted file can't be displayed
[client] Fix a bug in multi-part upload for large file sets.

[client] Fix a syncing bug after a big file is uploaded.

If a file is added to worktree when a big file (>100MB) is uploading,
the new file will not be auto uploaded later. This is a bug in the logic
of multi-part file upload.
Fix bug when remove all files in a repo.
[win] Fix a memory buffer bug in worktree monitor.
[server] Fix memory bugs.
[client] Fix bugs when cloning a large library.
[win] Fix command handling bug in wt-monitor.
[win] Fix command handling bug in wt-monitor.
[win] Fix a memory bug when unsyncing a library.
[client] fix minor sync timer bug.
[client] Fix a bug on worktree watching on Linux.

fixed typo, purely cosmetic

"executable" was written as "exectuble" and "exectuable"
fixed strftime on win32 server, Closes haiwen/seafile-client#134

[server] Fix a bug in recvfs-proc.

pending_objects should be decreased after the object is written
into disk.
[http] Fix a bug when download a non-existing block.
[server] Fix a bug when uploading file with client-encryption.
Fix a minor SQL bug.
Fix a minor bug in fsck.

Fix a few bugs.

* Sort fields in fs JSON object.
* Fix a minor bug in clone.
* Allow to use symlink for seafile-data directory.
* Enlarge sqlite connection pool and allow setting the size.
* Ignore invalid UTF-8 filename.
[server] Fix bugs in copy/move.
fixed a memory leak
Fix a index format bug.
Fix a few bugs and memory leak.
[server] Fix a error handling bug in get_last_modified().
[controller] fixed the place seafdav.conf
[client] Handle minor bug when deleting empty dir.
[controller] fixed read_seafdav_conf
[server] Fix bugs in seaf-fuse.

fixed a possible bug in httpserver

Refer to "man iconv_open".
[win] Fix task cancel bug in data transfer.
[client] Fix a bug.
[client] Fix Daylight Saving Time bug.

[client] fixed unsync_repos_by_server

It should be unsync_repos_by_account, otherwise it will lead to
problems when a user has two accounts on the same server
[enc] Fix bug of indexing file on the server.
[client] Fix error hanlding bug in new block transfer protocol.
[client] Fix a memory bug.
Fix encryption bug in new transfer protocol.
[enc] Improve code and fix some bugs.
[client] Fix a few empty pointer bug.
[client] Fix a bug when dir object is lost.
Fix a buffer bug in CDC.
[httpserver] fixed header for ajax upload/update handler
[httpserver] fixed a memory leak
[client] Fix a bug in unsync/resync.
[win] Fix bugs of ignore file.

[GC] Fix bug when there are about 65535 lived blocks.

The current implementation of bloom filter has an limitation on
blocks numbers. When there are about 65535 lived blocks, many
dead blocks can't be removed.

[client] Fix a bug in clone manager and GC.

After merging with an existing folder, create a "index" branch to
to refer to new changes from the worktree.

Previously we fulfill the same goal by forcing a commit operation
before setting repo->head. However the commit routine requires
repo->head and repo->worktree be set. This method is buggy and
doesn't work.

[client] Fix a GC bug.

Clone manager should set both REPO_LOCAL_HEAD and REPO_REMOTE_HEAD
properties after download is finished.
[client] Fix a few bugs.
[client] fixed a problem in heartbeat monitor
[server] fixed a bug in controller
[http] Fix a bug.
Fix a few memory bugs.
[client] Fix bugs of empty directory handling.
fixed a bug in translate-commit-desc.c
[http] Fix a bug in pack-dir.
[server] fixed an error in zip download a dir

[server] Fix bugs of block transfer timeouts.

* Use longer token timeout, 180 secs.
* Use longer block tx timeout, 30 secs.
* Reset timeout value before calling select().
[server] Fix a bug of diff.

[client] Fix a bug of commit algorithm.

Should update index even nothing to commit.

[client] Fix a bug of shutting down seafile while it's commiting.

The current code update index before commit. This will cause data
lost in the following sequence:
1. add and update index
2. restart
3. GC
4. add and update index and commit

The blocks added in the first add operation are removed by GC
since there is no commit pointing to them.
The second add operation won't add those blocks again because
the index has been updated.
fixed get_dir_size
[http] Fix a bug when downloading zip file.
fixed some spelling errors
fixed a bug in get_dir_size

[server] Fix a bug in share quota usage computation.

Should return 0 if user has no repo.
[http] Fix bug when downloading encrypted files.

[server] Fix a bug of showing deleted files when all history are kept.

Should convert commit->ctime to gint64 before comparing it with -1.

Fix bug of handling file names ended with spaces.

Thoes files/folders should be ignore when checking worktree
cleaness.

[server] Fix a few bugs.

Database related:
* Handle exception raised by libzdb ResultSet_next();
* GC should stop if fail to get repo list due to I/O error.
* Monitor shouldn't create tables on startup.
* Handle database creation failure on startup.
* Fix transaction bug in seaf_branch_manager_test_and_update_branch().
* Only retry a fix number of times in gen_new_commit().

Others:
* "common.h" should be included as the first header file.
* Fix a bug in accept_connection().
Fix a bug in index code.

[win] Fix bug of handling files larger than 4GB.

g_lstat() returns 32-bit struct stat on Windows, use _wstat64() instead.

Fix bugs in transfer protocols.

* Send update/response properly before ccnet_processor_done().
* Fix file handle leak in recv_blocks().
* Don't access processor memory in worker thread.
* Close data socket if error occurs in accept_connection().
* Use tdata->state instead of processor->state.
* Disable deprecated processors in seaf-server.

[http] Fix a bug in file upload.

When uploading more than one files, all files except the first one
were added a CRLF at the beginning.
Fix a minor bug.
Fix a bug in file chunking algorithm.
fixed a bug in gui/win/trayicon.c

Improve sync manager.

* Remove log messages from periodic sync.
* Fix a bug in auto commit.

[http] Add Content-Length=0 header to POST response.

Firefox expects this header. But latest libevhtp won't set it
automatically. This is a work around for libevhtp's bug.

[client] Fix bugs of transfer scheduling algorithm.

Don't schedule blocks based on transfer speed.
[client] Fix bugs in worktree path check when cloning a repo.
[client] Fix bug in transfer rate statistics.
[http] Fix a bug in upload file.

Fix a bug in creating seafdir object.

Entries in a seafdir object should be sorted when created on client.
fixed a bug in controller
[http] Fix bug of content-type response header.
fixed the limit param of traverse commit tree
[mac] fix a bug for repo worktree icon
[controller] fixed shortopt of -C
fixed a bug in controller
[http] Fix a bug in handling bad url.
[client] Fix a bug in new clone procedure.

[server] fixed a bug in repo-mgr.c

update_repo_size should use a seperate ccnet client
[server] fixed a bug in rename file

Fix a bug in seafile client.

wt_status_collect_untracked() function should not pass the full path
of a file to should_ignore() function.

[mac] fix some bugs when set the icon of the repo worktree which has
chinese character
fixed bugs in notify-sync

Fix a few bugs in transfer.

* Close block handle when recv block is interrupted.
* Fix bugs in block scheduling.

[applet] Update handle_seafile_notification()

Linux also handlers transfer messages and fix a memory leak bug
fixed a bug in recursive post/put/del/rename op

fixed a bug

don't start applet if there is already an instance running

[server] fixed a bug when renaming file online

the renamed dirent must be re-inserted into dirents
to maintain the descending order of dirents
